00039                 template <typename T> 
00040                 struct tmat3x2
00041                 {
00042                         enum ctor{null};
00043                         typedef T value_type;
00044                         typedef std::size_t size_type;
00045                         typedef tvec2<T> col_type;
00046                         typedef tvec3<T> row_type;
00047                         static size_type col_size();
00048                         static size_type row_size();
00049 
00050                         typedef tmat3x2<T> type;
00051                         typedef tmat2x3<T> transpose_type;
00052 
00053                 private:
00054                         // Data
00055                         col_type value[3];
00056 
00057                 public:
00058                         // Constructors
00059                         tmat3x2();
00060                         tmat3x2(tmat3x2 const & m);
00061 
00062                         explicit tmat3x2(
00063                                 ctor);
00064                         explicit tmat3x2(
00065                                 value_type const & s);
00066                         explicit tmat3x2(
00067                                 value_type const & x0, value_type const & y0,
00068                                 value_type const & x1, value_type const & y1,
00069                                 value_type const & x2, value_type const & y2);
00070                         explicit tmat3x2(
00071                                 col_type const & v0, 
00072                                 col_type const & v1,
00073                                 col_type const & v2);
00074 
00075                         // Conversion
00076                         template <typename U> 
00077                         explicit tmat3x2(tmat3x2<U> const & m);
00078 
00079                         explicit tmat3x2(tmat2x2<T> const & x);
00080                         explicit tmat3x2(tmat3x3<T> const & x);
00081                         explicit tmat3x2(tmat4x4<T> const & x);
00082                         explicit tmat3x2(tmat2x3<T> const & x);
00083                         explicit tmat3x2(tmat2x4<T> const & x);

00085                         explicit tmat3x2(tmat4x2<T> const & x);
00086                         explicit tmat3x2(tmat4x3<T> const & x);
00087 
00088                         // Accesses
00089                         col_type & operator[](size_type i);
00090                         col_type const & operator[](size_type i) const;
00091 
00092                         // Unary updatable operators
00093                         tmat3x2<T> & operator=  (tmat3x2<T> const & m);
00094                         template <typename U> 
00095                         tmat3x2<T> & operator=  (tmat3x2<U> const & m);
00096                         template <typename U> 
00097                         tmat3x2<T> & operator+= (U const & s);
00098                         template <typename U> 
00099                         tmat3x2<T> & operator+= (tmat3x2<U> const & m);
00100                         template <typename U> 
00101                         tmat3x2<T> & operator-= (U const & s);
00102                         template <typename U> 
00103                         tmat3x2<T> & operator-= (tmat3x2<U> const & m);
00104                         template <typename U> 
00105                         tmat3x2<T> & operator*= (U const & s);

00109                         tmat3x2<T> & operator/= (U const & s);
